title: Quarkus 3.21.2 - Maintenance release
content: We released Quarkus 3.21.2, the second maintenance release for our 3.21 release train.   NOTICEABLE CHANGES   JUNIT UPDATE  We had to update JUnit from 5.10 to 5.12 to solve an alignment issue with Mockito.  JUnit 5.11 comes with to how hierarchies of tests are handled so you might have to adjust your tests accordingly.   UPDATE  To update to Quarkus 3.21, we recommend updating to the latest version of the Quarkus CLI and run:  quarkus update  Note that quarkus update can update your applications from any version of Quarkus (including 2.x) to Quarkus 3.21.  For more information about the adjustments you need to make to your applications, please refer to the .   FULL CHANGELOG  You can get the full changelog of on GitHub.   COME JOIN US  We value your feedback a lot so please report bugs, ask for improvements… Let’s build something great together!
